page.title: 07Housekeeping at Chatsworth
page.content:
Chatsworth House is open daily from March until October from 11.30am to 4.30pm. It is cleaned every day by six ladies who dust and polish, and two men who do all the vacuuming of the carpets and then help with the selling of guide books.
In the winter when the House is closed all the walls and windows are cleaned and the furniture and floors polished. All the china is washed and the crystal chandeliers are taken down and cleaned.
Furniture and fabric restoration is also carried out when the House is closed to the public but still lived in by the family.
